Writing Data CDs http://vbaccelerator.com/home/NET/Code/Libraries/Writing_CDs/Writing_Data_CDs/article.asp This article demonstrates how to use the IMAPI wrapper to burn data CDs (also known as "Joliet" format CDs). Sample code is provided in both C# and VB. http://vbaccelerator.com/article.asp?id=15413 Sun, 27 Jun 2004 01:00:00 GMT Writing Audio CDs http://vbaccelerator.com/home/NET/Code/Libraries/Writing_CDs/Writing_Audio_CDs/article.asp This sample demonstrates how to burn audio CDs using the .NET IMAPI Wrapper from WAV files. Sample code is provided in both VB and C#. http://vbaccelerator.com/article.asp?id=15412 Sun, 27 Jun 2004 01:00:00 GMT WaveStreamReader and WaveStreamWriter http://vbaccelerator.com/home/NET/Code/Media/Audio/WaveStream/article.asp This article describes two classes which provide Stream wrappers around the Windows Multimedia API to work with .WAV files in .NET. These classes allow you to read and write .WAV files directly from managed code. Both C# and VB versions of the code are provided. http://vbaccelerator.com/article.asp?id=15506 Sun, 27 Jun 2004 01:00:00 GMT Image Mastering API (IMAPI) Wrapper for .NET http://vbaccelerator.com/home/NET/Code/Libraries/Writing_CDs/IMAPI/article.asp IMAPI is provided with Windows XP and above to provide full control over the creation of audio and data discs. This sample provides a wrapper around the API allowing it to be used from .NET; both VB and C# client code is provided. http://vbaccelerator.com/article.asp?id=15411 Sun, 27 Jun 2004 01:00:00 GMT
